name: Tank-O-Box Lite
description:
Attention! This version may not be compatible with iPhone 7!
-----------------------------------------

Tank-o-Box is an arcade combat game in which you operate a tank during intense battles that unfold on an imaginary writing desk between amusing children's sketches and office stationery. Completing your assignment won't be easy because you'll have to fight off a deadly onslaught of eight different types of tanks and armored vehicles out to turn your desk into another Stalingrad. Survival techniques include taking advantage of the terrain and maneuvering between numerous obstacles while lining up your next shot.

There's also iPad version of this game! Check the App Store!

LITE VERSION INCLUDES:
◇ Outstanding 3D graphics and sound effects
◇ 30 types of terrain; four seasons; daylight, and night effects
◇ New tanks, rocket launchers and pillboxes
◇ 10 awe-inspiring game levels with addictive gameplay
